remarks: If ` A ` converges to ` C ` , then ` F ` converges to C^2 . (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 29-Jun-2017.)
statement:
stirlinglem8.1 $e |- F/ n ph $.
stirlinglem8.2 $e |- F/_ n A $.
stirlinglem8.3 $e |- F/_ n D $.
stirlinglem8.4 $e |- D = ( n e. NN |-> ( A ` ( 2 x. n ) ) ) $.
stirlinglem8.5 $e |- ( ph -> A : NN --> RR+ ) $.
stirlinglem8.6 $e |- F = ( n e. NN |-> ( ( ( A ` n ) ^ 4 ) / ( ( D ` n ) ^ 2 ) ) ) $.
stirlinglem8.7 $e |- L = ( n e. NN |-> ( ( A ` n ) ^ 4 ) ) $.
stirlinglem8.8 $e |- M = ( n e. NN |-> ( ( D ` n ) ^ 2 ) ) $.
stirlinglem8.9 $e |- ( ( ph /\ n e. NN ) -> ( D ` n ) e. RR+ ) $.
stirlinglem8.10 $e |- ( ph -> C e. RR+ ) $.
stirlinglem8.11 $e |- ( ph -> A ~~> C ) $.
stirlinglem8 $p |- ( ph -> F ~~> ( C ^ 2 ) ) $.
